idx_5697a6ef87af3.title: It's customizable
idx_5697a6ef87af3.description: You're free to do what ever you want and more similar obvious reasons.

idx_5697a7589cbf9.title: It's multilingual
idx_5697a7589cbf9.description: You can add how many locales you want! We don't care! You can even add Pig Latin if you feel like it!
